game_description: SPARK BALL POOL is a social VR billiard game, where you can play with friends through real-time voice, and enjoy the same sense of presence and entertainment as offline billiards. Key Features: Comfortable Operation: the pool table can be freely rotated, raised, and zoomed in and out; players can set up cues quickly and accurately, adjusting angles easily. Available in small-scale space: only a small-scale space is required, sitting mode and standing mode are all available. Exquisite-Designed Play Experience: Experience the realistic physics gameplay, use sidespin, exquisite-designed sound effects, and interactive experience. Social Gameplay: Go grab your friends, and play billiard with a real in-life person in virtual reality. SPARK BALL POOL will keep constant updates, so please join our Discord for any feedback and suggestions: https://discord.gg/GEePrVGKWH
review_1: I have yet to play the game because every time i get in it says disconnected from the server and wont let me reconnect
review_2: Game was great and I played it almost every day now I can't connect to the server what happened? Does anybody know? This was Like the best pool game
review_3: Why can’t I log in anymore? Been saying that since Monday. Come on please update the game. I would pay for it. The best vr pool game out. It won’t let me reconnect
review_4: Every time I sign on, it will say disconnected. I usually get pissed off at it and go back to Pavlov shack. It's okay tho. I'm fine with it. I was just assuming that the game is abandoned.
